snippet: Three men who say they were sexually abused as teenagers by a prominent Catholic priest filed a lawsuit against the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Santiago.
abstract: Juan Carlos Cruz and two other men who say they were sexually abused as teenagers by Rev Fernando Karadima in Chile in the 1980s file suit against Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Santiago for failing to protect them.
lead_paragraph: Three men who say they were sexually abused as teenagers by a prominent Catholic priest filed a lawsuit against the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Santiago.

headline.main: Chile: 3 Sue Over Sexual Abuse Cases
headline.print_headline: Chile: 3 Sue Over Sexual Abuse Cases
